game.name: The Dagby Files
game.shortDescription: Assemble beautiful hand-illustrated jigsaw puzzles to unveil the clues as intrepid Inspector Dagby investigates dastardly crimes. Listen in as Dagby questions the suspects. Then solve the case yourself! Seven perplexing mysteries await. Features 28 brand-new illustrations from artist Dave Montes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Assemble beautiful hand-illustrated jigsaw puzzles to unveil the clues as intrepid Inspector Dagby investigates dastardly crimes. Listen in as Dagby questions the suspects. Then solve the case yourself! Seven perplexing mysteries await. Features 28 brand-new illustrations from artist Dave Montes.
